Healing Focus.name: Healing Focus
descriptions: Gives you a 35% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting any healing spell.
Gives you a 70% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting any healing spell.

Renewed Hope.name: Renewed Hope
descriptions: Increases the amount healed by your Renew spell by 10%.
Increases the amount healed by your Renew spell by 20%.
Increases the amount healed by your Renew spell by 30%.

Holy Specialization.name: Holy Specialization
descriptions: Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 1%.
Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 2%.
Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 3%.
Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 4%.
Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 5%.

Spell Warding.name: Spell Warding
descriptions: Reduces all spell damage taken by 4%.
Reduces all spell damage taken by 8%.
Reduces all spell damage taken by 12%.
Reduces all spell damage taken by 16%.
Reduces all spell damage taken by 20%.

Divine Fury.name: Divine Fury
descriptions: Reduces the casting time of your Smite, Holy Fire, Heal and Greater Heal spells by 0.1 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Smite, Holy Fire, Heal and Greater Heal spells by 0.2 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Smite, Holy Fire, Heal and Greater Heal spells by 0.3 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Smite, Holy Fire, Heal and Greater Heal spells by 0.4 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Smite, Holy Fire, Heal and Greater Heal spells by 0.5 sec.

Holy Nova.name: Holy Nova
descriptions: Causes an explosion of holy light around the caster, causing 32 Holy damage to all enemy targets within 10 yards and healing allies within 10 yards for 60.  These effects cause no threat.

Holy Reach.name: Holy Reach
descriptions: Increases the range of your offensive Holy spells and the radius of your Prayer of Healing and Holy Nova spells by 10%.
Increases the range of your offensive Holy spells and the radius of your Prayer of Healing and Holy Nova spells by 20%.
Increases the range of your offensive Holy spells and the radius of your Prayer of Healing and Holy Nova spells by 30%.

Inspiration.name: Inspiration
descriptions: Increases your target's armor by 8% for 15 seconds after getting a critical effect from your Flash Heal, Heal, Greater Heal, or Prayer of Healing spell.
Increases your target's armor by 16% for 15 seconds after getting a critical effect from your Flash Heal, Heal, Greater Heal, or Prayer of Healing spell.
Increases your target's armor by 25% for 15 seconds after getting a critical effect from your Flash Heal, Heal, Greater Heal, or Prayer of Healing spell.

Answered Prayers.name: Answered Prayers
descriptions: Reduces the Mana cost of your Prayer of Healing spell by 10%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your Prayer of Healing spell by 20%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your Prayer of Healing spell by 30%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your Prayer of Healing spell by 40%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your Prayer of Healing spell by 50%.

Gifted Healer.name: Gifted Healer
descriptions: Reduces the Mana cost of your Lesser Heal, Heal, and Greater Heal spells by 5%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your Lesser Heal, Heal, and Greater Heal spells by 10%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your Lesser Heal, Heal, and Greater Heal spells by 15%.

Searing Light.name: Searing Light
descriptions: Increases the damage of your Holy spells by 10%.

Blessed Recovery.name: Blessed Recovery
descriptions: After being struck by any attack, heal 33% of the damage taken over 6 seconds. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.
After being struck by any attack, heal 66% of the damage taken over 6 seconds. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.
After being struck by any attack, heal 100% of the damage taken over 6 seconds. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.

Spirit of Redemption.name: Spirit of Redemption
descriptions: Upon death, the priest becomes the Spirit of Redemption.  The Spirit of Redemption cannot move, attack, be attacked or targeted by any spells or effects.  While in this form, your mana is drained by 2% every 2 seconds.  When the Priest's mana falls below 10%, they will die.

Spiritual Guidance.name: Spiritual Guidance
descriptions: Increases all healing received by 5%.
Increases all healing received by 10%.
Increases all healing received by 15%.
Increases all healing received by 20%.
Increases all healing received by 25%.

Spiritual Healing.name: Spiritual Healing
descriptions: Increases the amount healed by your healing spells by 2%.
Increases the amount healed by your healing spells by 4%.
Increases the amount healed by your healing spells by 6%.
Increases the amount healed by your healing spells by 8%.
Increases the amount healed by your healing spells by 10%.

Lightwell.name: Lightwell
descriptions: Creates a holy Lightwell near the priest.  The Lightwell casts a nova every 2 seconds which deals 100 damage to nearby enemies and 100 healing to nearby allies. Lasts 30 seconds.
